Segment.name: AT3
Segment.comment: To specify Bill of Lading rates and charges

Field.name: Charge
Field.comment: For a line item: freight or special charge; for the total invoice: the total charges -- expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: FreightRateQualifier
Field.comment: Code qualifying the Bill of Lading freight rate

Field.name: FreightRate
Field.comment: Rate that applies to the specific commodity

Field.name: RatedAsQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of quantity on which the rate is based

Field.name: BillOfLadingChargeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of Bill of Lading charge
